args.content:
import Mathlib

open Set

variable {U : Set Complex} {f : Complex â†’ Complex} {p : Complex}

/-- Let U âŠ† â„‚ be open and connected, f : U â†’ â„‚ be holomorphic and nonconstant, and p âˆˆ U.
    Then there exists Î´ > 0 such that the restriction of f to the punctured disc Î”_Î´(p) \ {p}
    is an open map in the sense that the image of any open subset of that punctured disc is open. -/
lemma holomorphic_nonconstant_locally_open_at_point
  (hU : IsOpen U) (hconn : IsConnected U) (hf : DifferentiableOn â„‚ f U)
  (h_nonconst : âˆƒ x y, x âˆˆ U âˆ§ y âˆˆ U âˆ§ f x â‰  f y) (hp : p âˆˆ U) :
  âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ (s : Set Complex), IsOpen s â†’ s âŠ† (ball p Î´ \ {p}) â†’ IsOpen (f '' s) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Set Metric

variable {U : Set Complex} {f : Complex â†’ Complex} {p : Complex}

/-- Let U âŠ† â„‚ be open and connected, f : U â†’ â„‚ be holomorphic and nonconstant, and p âˆˆ U.
    Then there exists Î´ > 0 such that the restriction of f to the punctured disc Î”_Î´(p) \ {p}
    is an open map in the sense that the image of any open subset of that punctured disc is open. -/
lemma holomorphic_nonconstant_locally_open_at_point
  (hU : IsOpen U) (hconn : IsConnected U) (hf : DifferentiableOn â„‚ f U)
  (h_nonconst : âˆƒ x y, x âˆˆ U âˆ§ y âˆˆ U âˆ§ f x â‰  f y) (hp : p âˆˆ U) :
  âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ (s : Set Complex), IsOpen s â†’ s âŠ† (Metric.ball p Î´ \ {p}) â†’ IsOpen (f '' s) := by sorry
